hero.title: Who we are and why we exist
hero.description: Regulatory intelligence shouldn't be a luxury reserved for Fortune 500 companies. We built it for Spanish companies that need to anticipate, not react.

story.title: Our story
story.paragraph1: PREMSA.IO was born out of frustration. After watching dozens of Spanish companies receive six and seven-figure fines for regulatory changes they could have anticipated, we decided there had to be a better solution.
story.paragraph2: The problem wasn't a lack of qualified professionals. The problem was volume: 150+ regulatory documents published daily across BOE and 17 regional bulletins. No legal team, no matter how large, can process this effectively.
story.paragraph3: So we built PREMSA.IO: a platform that combines the speed of technology with the depth of analysis of a consultancy. We don't replace lawyers or compliance officers. We equip them with intelligence that allows them to do their job 10 times better.

mission.title: Our mission and values
mission.statement: Democratize access to high-level regulatory intelligence for all Spanish companies, not just the largest ones.

values.excellenceDesc: We don't compromise on quality. Every alert, every analysis must be impeccable.
values.transparencyDesc: Open pricing. Clear terms. Exit clause at month 3. No fine print, no surprises.
values.clientFirstDesc: Your success is our success. Every feature is designed with how to help you in mind.

team.title: The team
team.member1Bio: Former strategic consultant. Building tools that companies need.
team.member2Bio: 20 years building systems that don't fail. Obsessed with precision.
team.member3Bio: 15 years in compliance. Knows exactly what CLOs need.

bootstrapped.title: Bootstrapped and proud
bootstrapped.description: We built PREMSA.IO without external investors. This allows us to focus 100% on the product and customers.

cta.title: Help us build the future of regulatory intelligence
cta.description: We're looking for people who want to solve real problems for real companies.

hero.title: The regulatory intelligence that keeps you
hero.description: We detect, interpret, and contextualize regulatory changes before they affect your business. Because BOE surprises shouldn't be surprises.

problem.title: The problem nobody sees until it's too late
problem.card1Body: Published daily in Spain across BOE and 17 regional bulletins.
problem.card2Body: While the other 145 documents go unreviewed.
problem.card3Body: One of these documents could derail your Q3 with a 7-figure fine.

solution.title: How PREMSA.IO works
solution.pillar1Title: Don't wait for the BOE to surprise you
solution.pillar1Description: 24/7 monitoring of BOE + 17 regional bulletins with alerts in less than 24h from official publication.
solution.pillar2Title: Beyond legal text: understand the real impact
solution.pillar2Description: AI that explains concrete operational consequences. Legal Bedrock connects each regulation with existing legal context.
solution.pillar3Title: The platform that learns what matters to your business
solution.pillar3Description: Learns from your reactions, priorities, and compliance areas. Automatically filters the noise.

demo.title: üéÆ Discover how it works for your sector
demo.notYourSector: Don't see your sector? Contact us ‚Üí

hero.title: Regulatory intelligence that anticipates, not reacts
hero.description: Beyond monitoring: PREMSA.IO understands, contextualizes, and learns what matters to your business. 24/7, no breaks or vacations.

howItWorks.title: From BOE to your inbox in 3 steps
howItWorks.step1Description: BOE publishes RD 47/2025. PREMSA.IO detects it within the first 2 hours.
howItWorks.step2Description: AI processes the document with Legal Bedrock and generates a contextual report.
howItWorks.step3Description: You receive an email/Slack alert with executive summary and recommended action.

features.title: Three pillars of intelligence
features.detectionDescription: 24/7 monitoring of all official Spanish sources. Not just BOE - also 17 regional bulletins.
features.interpretationTitle: Legal Bedrock‚Ñ¢: context no human can match
features.interpretationDescription: Each new regulation is analyzed against the existing legal corpus. We detect contradictions and chained impacts.
features.memoryTitle: Learns what matters to your business
features.memoryDescription: PREMSA.IO learns from your reactions and priorities. Over time, it automatically filters the noise.

integrations.title: Integrate with your tools
integrations.apiTitle: Complete REST API for custom integration
integrations.apiDescription: Endpoints to access alerts, documents, reports, and configuration. OAuth 2.0.

security.title: Security and compliance at the center
security.feature1: AES-256 encryption at-rest and TLS 1.3 in-transit
security.feature4: Hosting in EU (Frankfurt) - zero data transfer outside EU
security.feature5: Annual pentesting by certified third parties

hero.description: The cost of 1 avoided fine pays for 10 years of subscription

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: On the Flexible plan, no. You can cancel with 30 days notice. The Commitment plan requires 12 months but includes an exit clause at month 3 if you're not satisfied.
faq.q2: How does the pilot program work?
faq.a2: The pilot lasts 6 months at a reduced price (‚Ç¨2,750/month). If after month 3 you're not convinced, you can exit without penalty. If you continue, it automatically converts to the Commitment plan.
faq.a3: Yes, we accept bank transfers for annual payments. For monthly payments, we use SEPA direct debit or credit card.
faq.a4: Yes, you can upgrade from Flexible to Commitment at any time. Downgrading from Commitment to Flexible is only possible at the end of the 12-month period.
faq.q5: Do you have pricing for startups or NGOs?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer special discounts for startups in seed/series A stage and for non-profit organizations. Contact us for more information.
faq.q6: What if I need more compliance areas?
faq.a6: You can add additional areas for ‚Ç¨500/month each. For enterprise needs with many areas, contact sales for custom pricing.
